divs: Sighting DetailsWe saw a flattened oval arrangement of lights go from west to east along the top of South Mountain toward the area of Homer Research Labs. We tried to follow it by car but were unsuccessful. This was told to MUFON F.I. 11726 on Sunday, July 31, 2011.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Bethlehem
There was one other sighting in Bethlehem on or around June 30th 1973
Summary: Witness saw odd arrangement of white lights pass overhead.
